name: part_004
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目誕生日2025】うれしい告知あり！ゲストあり！理想のライブはここにある【ホロライブ⧸ときのそら】 [IZDRnl38gvY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs 'Inochi ni Kirawarete iru.' on stage.
MC section where Tokino Sora talks to the audience and shares her excitement.
Introduction video for the guest performer, Hizuki Yui.
Tokino Sora introduces her first guest, Hizuki Yui.

subtitles.original: 言葉でこの傷が表せていいものか
subtitles.english: Could these words possibly express this wound?

subtitles.original: そんな意地ばかり抱え今日も一人ベッドに眠る
subtitles.english: Holding onto such stubbornness, I sleep alone in bed again today.

subtitles.original: 少年だった僕たちはいつか青年に変わっていく
subtitles.english: We who were boys will someday change into young men.

subtitles.original: 年老いていつか枯葉のように誰にも知られず朽ちていく
subtitles.english: Getting older, someday like withered leaves, we'll rot away unknown to anyone.

subtitles.original: 不死身の体を手に入れて一生死なずに生きてゆく
subtitles.english: Obtaining an immortal body, living forever without dying.

subtitles.original: そんなSFを妄想してる
subtitles.english: I'm daydreaming about such science fiction.

subtitles.original: 自分が死んでもどうでもよくて
subtitles.english: I don't care if I die,

subtitles.original: それでも周りに生きて欲しくて
subtitles.english: But I still want those around me to live.

subtitles.original: 矛盾を抱えて生きてくなんて怒られてしまう
subtitles.english: Living while holding such contradictions, I'd surely be scolded.

subtitles.original: 「正しいものは正しくいなさい」
subtitles.english: “Let what is right be right.”

subtitles.original: 「死にたくないなら生きていなさい」
subtitles.english: “If you don't want to die, then live.”

subtitles.original: 悲しくなるならそれでもいいならずっと一人で笑えよ
subtitles.english: If that makes you sad, and if you're fine with that, then just laugh alone forever.

subtitles.original: 僕らは命に嫌われている
subtitles.english: We are hated by life itself.

subtitles.original: 幸福の意味すらわからず
subtitles.english: Without even understanding the meaning of happiness,

subtitles.original: 生まれた環境ばかり憎んで
subtitles.english: Just hating the environment we were born into,

subtitles.original: 簡単に過去ばかり呪う
subtitles.english: Easily cursing our pasts.

subtitles.original: 僕らは命に嫌われている
subtitles.english: We are hated by life itself.

subtitles.original: さよならばかりが過ぎすぎて
subtitles.english: Too many goodbyes have passed us by,

subtitles.original: 本当の別れなど知らない
subtitles.english: Without knowing what a real parting is like.

subtitles.original: 僕らは命に嫌われている
subtitles.english: We are hated by life itself.

subtitles.original: 幸福も別れも愛情も友情も
subtitles.english: Happiness, partings, love, and friendship,

subtitles.original: 滑稽な夢の戯れで全部カネで買える代物
subtitles.english: In a ridiculous dream's play, they're all things that can be bought with money.

subtitles.original: 明日死んでしまうかもしれない
subtitles.english: We might die tomorrow.

subtitles.original: すべて無駄になるかもしれない
subtitles.english: Everything might become wasted.

subtitles.original: 朝も夜も春も秋も変わらず誰かがどこかで死ぬ
subtitles.english: Morning, night, spring, and autumn, someone dies somewhere without fail.

subtitles.original: 夢も明日も何もいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need dreams or tomorrow or anything.

subtitles.original: 君が生きていたならそれでいい
subtitles.english: As long as you're alive, that's enough.

subtitles.original: そうだ、本当はそういうことが歌いたい
subtitles.english: That's right, honestly, that's the kind of thing I want to sing.

subtitles.original: 命に嫌われている
subtitles.english: Hated by life itself.

subtitles.original: 結局いつかは死んでゆく
subtitles.english: In the end, we'll die eventually.

subtitles.original: 君だって僕だっていつかは枯葉のように朽ちてく
subtitles.english: You too, me too, will someday rot away like withered leaves.

subtitles.original: それでも僕らは必死に生きて
subtitles.english: Even so, we live desperately,

subtitles.original: 命を必死に抱えて生きて
subtitles.english: Clinging desperately to life as we live,

subtitles.original: 殺してあがいて笑って抱えて
subtitles.english: Killing, struggling, laughing, holding on,

subtitles.original: 生きて、生きて、生きて、生きて、生きろ
subtitles.english: Live, live, live, live, stay alive!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、今聴いてもらったのは
subtitles.english: Alright! So, what you just heard were

subtitles.original: 「サクラカゼ」と「命に嫌われている。」でした！
subtitles.english: “Sakura Kaze” and “Hated by Life Itself!”

subtitles.original: わー、緊張しすぎて、ちょっと何回か噛んじゃった。
subtitles.english: Wow, I was so nervous that I stumbled over my words a few times.

subtitles.original: リハの方が声出てたよ、絶対に。ね？そう思うでしょ？
subtitles.english: I definitely sang better during rehearsal. Right? Don't you think so?

subtitles.original: 画面の皆さーん！え？
subtitles.english: Everyone watching! Huh?

subtitles.original: わー！今トレンド2位なの？
subtitles.english: Wow! I'm trending at number two right now?

subtitles.original: みんなありがとーーー！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: 急なテンションの差にビビらないで。ねぇ？ねぇ？
subtitles.english: Don't be startled by the sudden change in mood. Okay? Okay?

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃよかった？「わんこ」って言わないで。
subtitles.english: It was really good? Don't call me 'wanko' (puppy).

subtitles.original: 私、犬じゃないんだ。わん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a dog. Woof!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: はい。落差がすごい。ね、落差すごいよね。
subtitles.english: Yes. The gap is huge. Right? It's a huge gap.

subtitles.original: いぇーい！でもさ、まだまだライブは始まったばっかりよ！
subtitles.english: Yay! But the live concert has only just begun!

subtitles.original: 今日初めて見に来ましたよー！って人、ぜひ楽しんでってねー！
subtitles.english: For those of you who came to see me for the first time today, please enjoy yourselves!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！ご機嫌。
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm in high spirits.

subtitles.original: というわけで、早速次はゲストパートに行っちゃおうかな！へへっ。
subtitles.english: So, let's head right into the guest section! Hehe.

subtitles.original: 最初のゲストは、この人だ！
subtitles.english: The first guest is... this person!

subtitles.original: GUEST 緋月ゆい
subtitles.english: GUEST Hizuki Yui

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、最初のゲストは、ゆいちゃんです！
subtitles.english: Alright! So, our first guest is Yui-chan!

subtitles.original: ゆいたーーーん！
subtitles.english: Yui-taaan!
